data.title: David Robbins Obituary 2015
data.meta_description: 51 year old, David Robbins of Wheatfield passed away September 14, 2015 at his home with his loving family around him.On October 19, 1963 in Rensselaer David was born to Larry R...
data.text:
51 year old, David Robbins of Wheatfield passed away September 14, 2015 at his home with his loving family around him.

On October 19, 1963 in Rensselaer David was born to Larry Robbins and Connie K. (Mitchell) Molden. David was a lifetime area resident. He worked as a concrete finisher for Hamstra Builders and was self employeed. David married Jamie Carter on April 29, 2012 at the Faith Pentecostal Church of God.

David is survived by his wife: Jamie, children: Tabitha (Gabriel) Arevalo, Autumn Townsend, McKenzie Carter, Elizabeth Carter, Heaven Carter, 4 grandchildren, father: Larry Robbins, siblings: Karen Sims, Vivian Kay Andrews, and Geno Robbins.

David was preceded in death by his mother Connie Molden and son: Calvin Robbins.

Friends are invited to visit with the family on Wednesday, September 16, 2015, from 11:00 a.m. until 1:00 p.m. at the Boersma Funeral Home, 90 East Grove St., Wheatfield, Indiana. Service for David will take place at the funeral home on Wednesday, September 16, 2015 at 1:00 p.m. with Pastor Rick Helton officiating. Interment will follow at the Wheatfield Cemetery.

In lieu of flowers memorials may be made to the family.
